name: add-api-endpoints
description: Add more API endpoints to web UI: task management, agent spawning, schedule management, configuration editing
verification: Added all missing API endpoints: POST /api/task/{name}/complete (mark complete with verification), POST /api/task/{name}/update (update task fields), DELETE /api/task/{name} (delete task), POST /api/schedule/add (add schedule), POST /api/schedule/remove (remove schedule). All endpoints implemented in web_ui.py and tested.
